unnormalised: New Delhi, 26/07/2024: The Delhi High Court has issued a significant ruling in a case involving copyright infringement, upholding the rights of author Priya Sharma against a publishing house. Adv. R.K. Mehra, representing Ms. Sharma, argued that the unauthorized reproduction constituted a clear violation of intellectual property law.
